name: Executing
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +[3.5 - 7.5]%% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

name: Perpetual
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15%% Chance to Restore +[28.3 - 31.8]%% Primary Resource

name: Vampire's
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 15%% Chance to Heal +[18 - 38] Life

name: Aspect of Legend 1
description: This is the descriptive text for the Legendary Power 1 affix.Dash no longer costs Energy but instead has a 5 second cooldown. In addition, enemies hit by Dash deal [40 - 50]%% less damage to you for 7 seconds.

name: Suffocating
description: +[5.0 - 10.0]%% Damage to Shadow Damage Over Time-Affected Enemies

description: This is the descriptive text for the Legendary Power 2 affix

name: Aspect of Redirected Force
description: Gain increased Critical Strike Damage equal to [30 - 70]%%[x] of your Block Chance. Blocking doubles this bonus for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Unyielding Hits
description: Casting a Gorilla Skill increases your Weapon Damage by [10 - 30]%% of your Armor for 3 seconds. Maximum 1,500 bonus Weapon Damage.

name: Fell Soothsayer's Aspect
description: When you cast an Incarnate Skill enemies around you become Vulnerable for 5 seconds. Killing a Vulnerable enemy echoes [15 - 55]%% of the killing blow's damage to another Nearby enemy.

name: Aspect of the Great Feast
description: Your Minions deal [30 - 45]%%[x] increased damage, but each one drains 1 Essence from you per second. If you have no active Minions, the damage increase applies to you instead, and you lose 7 Essence per second.

name: Aspect of Star Shards
description: Knives from Dance of Knives have a 50%% chance to shatter into 6 shards of metal on hit, dealing [150 - 180] Physical damage.Dance of Knives now spends Combo Points, granting up to 3 additional Charges that can exceed the Maximum.

name: Rebounding Aspect
description: Quill Volley's feathers explode at their apex and return to where they were cast, both dealing [35 - 55]%% of their normal damage.

name: Aspect of Shredding Blades
description: Ice Blades' chance to apply Vulnerable is increased by 20%%[+] and the Vulnerable duration is increased by 4 seconds. You gain [15 - 35]%%[x] Vulnerable Damage.

name: Blood Boiling Aspect
description: When your Core Skills Overpower an enemy, you spawn 3 Volatile Blood Drops. Collecting a Volatile Blood Drop causes it to explode, dealing [188 - 638] Physical damage around you. Every 20 seconds, your next Skill is guaranteed to Overpower.

name: Aspect of Anger Management
description: While above [55 - 40] Fury, you are Berserk, but lose 2 Fury per second.

name: Aspect of Plains Power
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 25%%[+] chance to create a Mystic Circle for 10 seconds. Casting a Jaguar Skill in Mystic Circles empowers them to keep your Ferocity at Maximum and increase your damage by [2.0 - 4.1]%%[x] per stack while you remain within.

name: Flamethrower's Aspect
description: Incinerate splits into 3 beams, each dealing [70 - 90]%%[x] of normal damage.

name: Aspect of Accursed Touch
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [20.0 - 40.0]%% chance for your Skills to inflict Vampiric Curse on enemies. Enemies afflicted with Vampiric Curse are also Vulnerable.Vampiric Curse's stored souls deal [20.0 - 60.0]%% increased damage.

name: Shademist Aspect
description: Your Minions deal 38 Shadow damage per second to enemies around them. The damage over time lasts for [2.0 - 5.0] seconds after leaving the aura.

name: Aspect of Recalling Feathers
description: Casting a Focus Skill recalls all Nearby Storm Feathers, dealing [75 - 96] Lightning damage to enemies along their way. If there are no Nearby Storm Feathers, the cast instead spawns 10 randomly around you.

name: Aspect of Stolen Vigor
description: While at maximum stacks of the Momentum Key Passive, your Cutthroat Skills deal [30 - 50]%% increased damage and you become Unstoppable for 3 seconds every 8 seconds.

name: Breakneck Bandit's Aspect
description: Flurry deals [25 - 45]%%[x] increased damage and has a 20%% chance to Stun enemies for 3 seconds with each hit.

name: Aspect of Elements
description: Gain [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage to a set of damage types for 7 seconds.  This effect alternates between 2 sets: Fire, Lightning, and Physical. Cold, Poison, and Shadow.

name: Aspect of Wild Claws
description: Rake manifests a Spirit Jaguar which also casts Rake at a random enemy, dealing [45 - 65]%% Base damage.

name: Imprisoned Spirit's Aspect
description: When Bone Spirit explodes inside a Bone Prison, it explodes an additional time, dealing [40.0 - 80.0]%% of normal damage. Bone Spirit now prioritizes enemies inside a Bone Prison.

name: Aspect of True Sight
description: You deal [70 - 100]%%[x] increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies marked by Inner Sight. While Inner Sight is full, you gain [21 - 30]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Retaliation
description: Your Core Skills deal up to [35 - 75]%%[x]  increased damage based on your amount of Fortify.

name: Clandestine Aspect
description: Gain +2 to Agility and Subterfuge Skills.

name: Aspect of Bursting Bones
description: When a segment of Bone Prison is destroyed or expires, it deals [113 - 203] damage in an area around itself.

name: Aspect of Creeping Death
description: You deal [5.0 - 20.0]%%[x] increased damage over time to enemies for each different Crowd Control effect they're afflicted by. Unstoppable enemies and Staggered Bosses take [10 - 40]%%[x] increased damage over time from you instead.

name: Veteran Brawler's Aspect
description: Each time a Core Skill deals direct damage to an enemy, your next Charge, Leap, or Kick deals [4.0 - 10.0]%%[x] increased damage, up to [20 - 50]%%[x].

name: Aspect of Encircling Blades
description: Flurry damages enemies in a circle around you and deals [35 - 55]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Shattered Stars
description: Meteorites fall around Meteor, dealing [30 - 50]%% of Meteor's damage on impact. Your Meteorites additionally Burn enemies they hit for [135 - 225] damage over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of Fel Gluttony
description: Your Golem Active also causes your Golem to erupt, dealing [300 - 600] Physical damage to surrounding enemies. Your Golem consumes Corpses to reduce its remaining Cooldown by 1 second.

name: Aspect of Swelling Curse
description: Bone Spirit's Critical Strike Chance is increased by [10 - 30]%%[+].Each enemy hit by Bone Spirit increases your Maximum Essence by 2, for 15 seconds, up to 50 Essence.

name: Coldclip Aspect
description: Your Basic Skills are always Cold Imbued.You deal [5 - 20]%%[x] increased damage to enemies who are Chilled or Frozen.

name: Aspect of Untimely Death
description: Each percent of your Maximum Life you Heal beyond 100%% grants you 0.5%%[x] bonus Critical Strike Damage on your next Critical Strike, up to a [30 - 70]%%[x] bonus.You may now drink your Healing Potion while at full Life.

name: Aspect of Falling Feathers
description: Moving with a Mobility Skill or Evade spawns Storm Feathers along behind you.Storm Feathers now drop from the sky as they are spawned, each dealing [75 - 96] Lightning damage on impact.

name: Aspect of the Rampaging Werebeast
description: The duration of Grizzly Rage is increased by [3.0 - 10.0] seconds. In addition, Critical Strikes while Grizzly Rage is active increase your Critical Strike Damage by 10%%[x] for the duration, up to a maximum of 200%%[x].

name: Aspect of Splintering Energy
description: Critical Hits with Lightning Spear cause lightning to arc from it dealing [75 - 135] damage to its target and up to 5 other enemies. This damage is increased by 100%%[x] of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus.

name: Moonrage Aspect
description: Kills have a 5%% chance to summon a Wolf Companion to your side for [20 - 35] seconds. This effect is a Lucky Hit against bosses. Maximum 3 additional wolves.In addition, gain +3 Ranks to Wolves.

name: Aspect of Fierce Winds
description: Your Shout Skills create 3 Dust Devils that deal [60 - 120] damage to enemies along their path.Your Dust Devils are [5 - 25]%% bigger and deal 1%%[x] increased damage for each 1%% their size is increased.

name: Sacrificial Aspect
description: Your Sacrifice bonuses are increased by [35 - 55]%%.

name: Aspect of Biting Cold
description: When you Freeze an enemy there is a [25 - 45]%% chance they become Vulnerable for 3 seconds.

name: Storm Swell Aspect
description: You deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage while Ice Armor is active. This amount is increased by another 0%%[x] against Frozen enemies.

name: Aspect of Rallying Reversal
description: You have a [20 - 60]%% chance to gain 1 Ferocity when you Crowd Control an enemy or apply any Stagger to a Boss.

name: Aspect of Combined Strikes
description: Each different Basic Skill you cast increases all your damage by [5.0 - 15.0]%%[x] for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Elemental Constellation
description: Casting Pyromancy, Shock, and Frost Skills conjures a matching Elemental Dagger around you that pierces through enemies dealing [75 - 1,575] damage after 3 seconds. The damage increases by 100%% per matching elemental skill you cast.

name: Aspect of the Moonrise
description: Damaging an enemy with a Basic Skill grants you 4%% Attack Speed for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum stacks, you enter a Vampiric Bloodrage, gaining [40 - 100]%%[x] Basic Skill damage and 15%% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

name: Aspect of Ultimate Shadow
description: Bone Storm and Blood Wave are also Darkness Skills, deal Shadow damage, and gain additional effects:  Enemies damaged by Bone Storm take [120 - 345] Shadow damage over 2 seconds.  Blood Wave creates Desecrated Ground as it travels, dealing [1,920 - 5,520] Shadow damage over 4 seconds

name: Dust Devil's Aspect
description: Whirlwind leaves behind Dust Devils that deal [120 - 210] damage to enemies in their path.

name: Aspect of Frozen Memories
description: The Avalanche Key Passive now applies to 2 additional casts.

name: Aspect of Serration
description: The Ossified Essence Key Passive also increases the Critical Strike Damage of your Bone Skills by 1%%[x] per Essence above 50, up to [25 - 45]%%[x].

name: Phasing Poltergeist's Aspect
description: When Bone Spirit explodes, it spawns 3 spirits that seek nearby enemies and deal [20 - 40]%% of its damage. This effect can only occur once per cast.

name: Gravitational Aspect
description: Ball Lightning orbits around you and deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage. You may have up to 10 Ball Lightnings and casting more increases the damage of the existing ones by 10%% each.

name: Aspect of the Stampede
description: Gain 1 additional Companion. In addition, your Companion Skills deal [15 - 35]%%[x] bonus damage.

name: Aspect of Infestation
description: Lucky Hit: Centipede Skills have up to a 35%% chance to spawn a Pestilent Swarm from the target which deals [53 - 113] Poison damage per hit.Pestilent Swarms now also deal 100%% of their Base damage as Poisoning damage over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Expectant
description: After attacking enemies with a Basic Skill, increase the damage of your next Core Skill cast within 5 seconds by [5 - 12]%%[x], up to 30%%[x].

name: Reaping Lotus' Aspect
description: Sever no longer returns and instead splits into 3 specters that expand out from its apex. Sever deals [110 - 170]%% of normal damage.

name: Edgemaster's Aspect
description: Skills deal up to [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage based on your available Primary Resource when cast, receiving the maximum benefit while you have full Primary Resource.

name: Aspect of Rathma's Chosen
description: Whenever your Blood Skills Overpower you gain [35 - 55]%%[+] Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

name: Bristleback Aspect
description: When you Dodge or Block an attack you trigger a [100 - 160]%% Thorns attack against the attacker.

name: Aspect of Sundered Ground
description: Every 20 seconds, your next Upheaval cast is guaranteed to Overpower and deals [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage. Upheaval Critical Strikes against Elites reduce this timer by 1 second.

name: Conceited Aspect
description: Deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage while you have a Barrier active.

name: Aspect of Simple Reprisal
description: When you cast the 3rd attack of your Basic Skills you have a [10 - 30]%% chance to unleash Payback.

name: Aspect of Inevitable Fate
description: When an enemy falls below 35%% Life while afflicted with any of your damage over time effects, an explosion occurs every 7 seconds, dealing [300 - 525] damage for each element they're afflicted by.

name: Needleflare Aspect
description: Thorns damage dealt has a [25 - 45]%% chance to deal damage to all enemies around you and your Minions.

name: Aspect of the Rabid Bear
description: While Grizzly Rage is active, Skills that Critically Strike apply Rabies and your Poison damage is increased by [30 - 90]%%.

name: Unrelenting Aspect
description: Every 3rd consecutive Crushing Hand smashes an additional 10 times around you dealing [25 - 45]%% of its Base damage per hit.

name: Lightning Dancer's Aspect
description: Lightning Storm Critical Strikes spawn 3 Dancing Bolts that seek enemies in the area dealing [165 - 233] Lightning damage.

name: Tormentor's Aspect
description: Enemies who move while Poisoned by you additionally take [50 - 250]%% of your Thorns damage per second.

name: Aspect of Three Curses
description: Increase the Critical Strike Damage of Meteor and Fireball by [25 - 45]%%[x]. Double this bonus against Healthy targets.

name: Aspect of the Alpha
description: Your Wolf Companions are now Werewolf Companions. Werewolf Companions deal [100 - 140]%%[x] additional damage and can spread Rabies.

name: Aspect of Overwhelming Currents
description: Unstable Currents has a [25 - 45]%% chance to cast an additional Shock Skill.

name: Aspect of Potent Exchange
description: Gain 1 Resolve when you Dodge an attack. Your Potency Skills consume 2 Resolve to deal [15 - 55]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Gore Quills
description: Casting Blood Lance will consume Blood Orbs to also conjure lances from them. Each additional Blood Lance deals [20 - 60]%% of normal damage and prioritizes targeting un-lanced enemies.

name: Wanton Rupture Aspect
description: Your Rupture does not remove the Bleeding damage from enemies. Can only occur once every [30 - 10] seconds.

name: Lightning Rod Aspect
description: Chain Lightning has a 25%% chance to deal [50 - 90]%%[x] increased damage. This chance is doubled against Bosses or Crowd Controlled enemies and prefers them as targets.

name: Aspect of Retribution
description: Distant enemies have a 10%% chance to be Stunned for 2 seconds when they hit you. You deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage to Stunned or Knocked Down enemies.

name: Aspect of Engulfing Flames
description: You deal 6%%[x] increased Burning damage to enemies for each second they remain Burning, up to 30%%[x] after 5 seconds. Additionally, you deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased Burning damage to enemies that are not Healthy.

name: Aspect of Synergy
description: Using an Agility Skill reduces the Cooldown of your next Subterfuge Skill by 20%%. Using a Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Agility Skill by [35 - 55]%%[x].

name: Aspect of Artful Initiative
description: When you spend 75 Energy you release a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [78 - 168] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 seconds.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Ancient Flame
description: While both bonuses from the Esu's Ferocity Key Passive are active, your Attack Speed is increased by [35 - 55]%%.

name: Aspect of Iron Rain
description: Smoke Grenade has a [80 - 100]%% chance to create an Arrow Storm where it explodes, dealing [120 - 360] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms continuously apply Vulnerable.

name: Reaper's Aspect
description: Enemies you Poison have 100%% Reduced Healing and your Eagle Skills gain [10 - 30]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance against them.

name: Aspect of Nature's Savagery
description: Werewolf Skills function as Storm Skills and Werebear Skills function as Earth Skills for the Nature's Fury Key Passive.

name: High Velocity Aspect
description: Barrage arrows now pierce through 1 enemy.Barrage has [10.0 - 30.0]%%[+] increased Attack Speed.

name: Aspect of Limitless Rage
description: Each point of Fury you generate while at Maximum Fury grants your next Core Skill within 5 seconds [1.00 - 3.00]%%[x] increased damage, stacking up to 15 times.

name: Aspect of Empowering Reaper
description: Damaging enemies with Sever has a [15 - 35]%% chance to spawn a pool of Blight under the target that deals [60 - 140]%%[x] bonus damage. This effect can only happen once every 3 seconds.

name: Ruthless Aspect
description: Your Critical Strike Chance with Jaguar Skills is increased against enemies by [1.0 - 11.0]%%[+] for each 10%% of their missing Life.

name: Aspect of Shattered Defenses
description: Stone Burst causes enemies to take [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage from your other Skills for 5 seconds. Stone Burst's Spirit cost is reduced by 10.

name: Aspect of Earthquakes
description: Ground Stomp creates an Earthquake damaging enemies for [167 - 287] Physical damage over 4 seconds. While standing in Earthquakes, you deal [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Blast-Trapper's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Dealing damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills has a [15 - 35]%% chance to cause an explosion that deals [75 - 105] Shadow damage and applies Vulnerable for 2 seconds.

name: Stormchaser's Aspect
description: Tornado will seek up to [1 - 5] targets.

name: Aspect of Bristling Vengeance
description: Payback now echoes forward and additionally deals [40 - 80]%% of your Thorns damage to enemies.

name: Serpentine Aspect
description: You may have 1 additional Hydra active, and Hydra's duration is increased by [10 - 30]%%.

name: Aspect of the Wildrage
description: Your Companions gain double the bonus from the Bestial Rampage Key Passive.

name: Aspect of Control
description: You deal [20 - 40]%%[x] more damage to Immobilized, Stunned, or Frozen enemies.

name: Aspect of Inner Calm
description: Deal [5 - 13]%%[x] increased damage. Triple this bonus after standing still for 3 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Tempest
description: Hurricane damage is increased by [10.5 - 20.5]%%[x] each second while active.

name: Aspect of the Unbroken Tether
description: Chain Lightning has a [25 - 45]%% chance to chain 5 additional times.

name: Aspect of Herculean Spectacle
description: Mighty Throw deals [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage and hurls another 2 weapons.

name: Shepherd's Aspect
description: Companion Skills deal an additional [5.0 - 13.0]%%[x] damage per Companion you have.

name: Shard of Dawn Aspect
description: After 30 seconds of Night's Grasp, gain Dawn's Haste, increasing your Attack Speed by [20 - 40]%% and Movement Speed by 20%% for 12 seconds. While empowered by the Midwinter Ward, killing an enemy reduces Night's Grasp's duration by 1 second.

name: Immobilizing
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +[7.0 - 12.0]%% Chance to Immobilize for 2 Seconds

name: Aspect of Corruption
description: Your Imbuement Skill effects have [25 - 45]%%[x] increased potency against Vulnerable enemies.

name: Executioner's Aspect
description: Killing an enemy with an Overpower leaves behind an Earthquake at their location, dealing [300 - 602] Physical damage over 4 seconds. Can only occur once every 4 seconds.

name: Opportunist's Aspect
description: When you enter or break Stealth, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades around you that deal [180 - 270] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Dire Wolf's Aspect
description: Grizzly Rage is now a Werewolf Skill and Shapeshifts you into a Dire Werewolf. Dire Werewolves gain [10 - 30]%%[+] Movement Speed and [20 - 60]%% Spirit Cost Reduction instead of Damage Reduction. In addition, kills Heal you for 10%% of your Maximum Life.

name: Aspect of Surprise
description: When you Evade or Shadow Step, you drop a cluster of exploding Stun Grenades that deal [90 - 270] total Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1.00 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Unyielding Commander's Aspect
description: While Army of the Dead is active, your Minions gain [70 - 110]%%[x] increased damage and take 90%% reduced damage.

name: Dazing
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +[7.0 - 12.0]%% Chance to Daze for 2 Seconds

name: Runeworker's Conduit Aspect
description: Critical Strikes with Storm Skills that you cast charge the air around you for 3 seconds causing a Lightning Bolt to periodically hit an enemy in the area for [375 - 600] Lightning damage. Your Lightning Bolts deal [20 - 50]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of the Blurred Beast
description: While dashing, Shred seeks out Nearby Poisoned and deals [55 - 75]%%[x] increased damage to them.

name: Aspect of Ancestral Charge
description: Charge calls forth 4 Ancients who also Charge, dealing [20 - 40]%%[x] of normal damage.

name: Splintering Aspect
description: Bone Spear's primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first Vulnerable for 3 seconds. Bone Shards from Bone Spear deal [30 - 70]%% bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies and pierce them.

name: Aspect of Encroaching Wrath
description: After spending 100 Fury, your next Weapon Mastery Skill within 5 seconds deals [40 - 80]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Repeating Aspect
description: Rapid Fire has a [30 - 50]%% chance to ricochet to another target.

name: Aspect of Pestilent Points
description: Every 3rd cast of Puncture is Poison Imbued with [105 - 165]%% of normal potency.

name: Aspect of the Damned
description: You and your Minions deal [35 - 55]%%[x] increased Shadow damage to enemies afflicted by any Curse.

name: Blood-soaked Aspect
description: Blood Mist leaves a trail of Desecrated Ground that lasts for 4 seconds and deals [68 - 98] Shadow damage per second. Gain 20%%[+] Movement Speed while Blood Mist is active.

name: Aspect of Pestilence
description: Stinger spawns a Pestilent Swarm at its target location which deals [35 - 75]%% of Stinger's Base damage per hit.Pestilent Swarms now last 100%%[+] longer and spiral outwards.

name: Earthstriker's Aspect
description: After swapping weapons 8 times, your next non-Basic Skill will Overpower and deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased Overpower damage.

name: Aspect of Metamorphic Stone
description: Boulder is now also a Core Skill and costs 40 Spirit to cast dealing [90 - 130]%% of normal damage.

name: Aspect of Overheating
description: After channeling Incinerate for 3 seconds it deals [45 - 105] Critical Fire damage per second for 5 seconds. Casting Incinerate refreshes and maintains this bonus.

name: Skullbreaker's Aspect
description: Stunning a Bleeding enemy deals [25 - 45]%% of their total Bleeding amount to them as Physical damage.

name: Icy Alchemist's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75%% chance to release an explosion that deals [135 - 195] Cold damage to the target and surrounding enemies, Chilling them for 25%%. If they were already Chilled or Frozen, increase this damage by 100%%[x].

name: Blighted Aspect
description: You deal [35 - 55]%%[x] increased damage for 6 seconds after the Shadowblight Key Passive damages enemies 10 times.

name: Aspect of the Flaming Rampage
description: Charge gains an additional Charge. Each target hit by it explodes for [104 - 194] Fire damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Windlasher Aspect
description: Casting Double Swing creates a Dust Devil that deals [53 - 83] damage to enemies in its path.

name: Aspect of Arrow Storms
description: Lucky Hit: Your Marksman and Cutthroat Skills have up to a 25%% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location, dealing [156 - 486] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms deal [45 - 65]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of Anticline Burst
description: Stone Burst deals [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage and when Cast at or above 75 Spirit, it is immediately at its maximum size.

name: Aspect of the Frozen Tundra
description: While Deep Freeze is active, exploding Ice Spikes form in the area, dealing [150 - 195] Cold damage. Your Ice Spikes have a 50%% increased explosion radius.

name: Blood-bathed Aspect
description: Blood Surge's nova echoes again after a short delay, dealing [30 - 10]%%[x] less damage.

name: Aspect of Charged Flash
description: After Charged Bolts hits enemies 50 times, your next 3 casts of Charged Bolts becomes waves that pierce and deal [300 - 360] Critical Shock Damage.

name: Accelerating Aspect
description: Critical Strikes with Core Skills increase your Attack Speed by [10.0 - 30.0]%%[+] for 5 seconds.

name: Bladedancer's Aspect
description: Twisting Blades orbit for a short time after they return to you, dealing [40 - 60]%% of Twisting Blades' return damage per hit.

name: Aspect of Tenuous Destruction
description: Deal [25.0 - 45.0]%%[x] increased damage while you have no Defensive Skills on your Action Bar.

name: Shockwave Aspect
description: Pulverize creates a shockwave that travels forward, dealing [80 - 120]%% of its damage to targets in the path.

name: Starving Ravager's  Aspect
description: Ravager no longer has a duration and instead drains [25 - 5] Vigor every second until depleted. Effects which extend Ravager instead generate Vigor.

name: Aspect of Conflagration
description: While channeling Incinerate, your Burning damage is increased by [25 - 45]%%[x]. Enemies damaged by Incinerate explode, Burning all surrounding enemies for [120 - 420] over 6 seconds. Can only occur once every 3 seconds.

name: Insatiable Aspect
description: Kills extend the duration of your active Touch of Death swarms by 0.2 seconds. When a swarm is replaced early it bursts for [100 - 300]%% of the damage it would have done.

name: Battle Caster's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: When your Conjuration Skills hit you have up to a [25 - 45]%% chance to gain +1 Rank to your Conjuration skills for 12 seconds.  This can stack up to 5 times.

name: Aspect of the Trampled Earth
description: Trample now summons 6 Landslide pillars of earth during its duration that deal [70 - 110]%% normal damage. Trample is now also a Nature Magic and Earth Skill.

name: Tidal Aspect
description: Blood Wave fires two additional waves, each dealing [100 - 120]%% of normal damage.

name: Aspect of the Changeling's Debt
description: You deal [25 - 65]%%[x] increased damage while hitting a Poisoned enemy as a Werebear or a Crowd Controlled enemy as a Werewolf.

name: Elementalist's Aspect
description: Core Skills cast at or above 100 Mana gain a [25.0 - 45.0]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance.

name: Aspect of Frozen Orbit
description: Frozen Orb deals [30 - 50]%% increased damage and explodes an additional time.

name: Aspect of Poisonous Clouds
description: When entering Stealth, create a cloud that deals [900 - 1,170] Poison damage over 6 seconds.

name: Aspect of the Ursine Horror
description: Pulverize is now also an Earth Skill. After casting Pulverize, tectonic spikes continue to deal [180 - 300] damage over 2 seconds.

name: Crashstone Aspect
description: Earth Skills deal [35 - 75]%%[x] increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

name: Aspect of Shattering Steel
description: Steel Grasp and Iron Maelstrom launch up to 10 metal shards that deal [120 - 420] Physical damage.

name: Aspect of Armageddon
description: A hail of Meteorites falls during Inferno, dealing [75 - 135] Fire damage on impact. Your Meteorites Immobilize enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Stable Aspect
description: While Unstable Currents is not active, your Shock Skills have a [6.5 - 17.0]%% chance to trigger a free cast from it.

name: Shattered Aspect
description: Explosions from the Shatter Key Passive deal [30 - 50]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Aspect of Decay
description: Each time the Shadowblight Key Passive deals damage to enemies, it increases the next Shadowblight's damage within 10 seconds by [30 - 50]%%[x], stacking up to 5 times.

name: Smiting Aspect
description: You have [13 - 23]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance against Injured enemies. While you are Healthy, you gain [25 - 45]%%[+] increased Crowd Control Duration.

name: Aspect of the Frozen Wake
description: While Ice Armor is active, you leave behind exploding Ice Spikes that deal [120 - 165] damage. Your Ice Spikes deal 15%%[x] increased damage to Frozen enemies.

name: Aspect of Berserk Ripping
description: Whenever you deal direct damage while Berserking, inflict [15 - 35]%% of the Base damage dealt as additional Bleeding damage over 5 seconds.

name: Battle-Mad Aspect
description: Gain Berserking for [1.5 - 5.0] seconds after swapping weapons 8 times.

name: Overcharged Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a [15 - 31]%% chance when dealing Lightning damage to overload the target for 3 seconds, causing any direct damage you deal to them to pulse [180 - 300] additional damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Trickshot Aspect
description: Whenever Penetrating Shot damages an enemy, 2 additional arrows split off to either side. These side arrows deal [10 - 30]%% of Penetrating Shot's Base damage and do not split.

name: Winter Touch Aspect
description: When you Freeze an enemy, you deal [225 - 450] Cold damage to them.This effect is treated as a Frost Skill.

name: Firestarter Aspect
description: When newly Burning an enemy, you deal an additional [113 - 225] Fire damage to them.This effect is treated as a Pyromancy Skill.

name: Aspect of Frenzied Dead
description: Each time one of your Minions damages an enemy, they gain [10 - 18]%%[+] Attack Speed for 3 seconds, up to [30 - 54]%%[+].

name: Aspect of Unstable Imbuements
description: When casting an Imbuement Skill you trigger an explosion around yourself, applying the Imbuement effects and dealing [83 - 173] damage of the same type.

name: Aspect of Volatile Shadows
description: When a Dark Shroud shadow is removed you trigger an explosion that deals [113 - 173] Shadow damage and applies Shadow Imbuement to each enemy it hits.

name: Aspect of Plunging Darkness
description: Bone Prison spawns a pool of Blight that deals [80 - 140]%%[x] bonus damage over 6 seconds.

name: Osseous Gale Aspect
description: Bone Storm consumes up to 8 Corpses to increase its duration by up to [5.0 - 15.0] seconds.

name: Aspect of Splintering Shards
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 100%% chance when hitting or killing a Frozen enemy to create ice splinters that fires away from them dealing [38 - 68] Cold damage and Chilling for [20 - 30]%%.

name: Aspect of Ancestral Force
description: Hammer of the Ancients quakes outward for [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage. This bonus is doubled against Bosses.

name: Rotting Aspect
description: Decompose can chain and burst up to 2 additional targets. Explosions from Decompose deal [15 - 35]%%[x] increased damage.

name: Mighty Storm's Aspect
description: The Earthen Might Key Passive also applies to your Storm Skills.

name: Aspect of Branching Volleys
description: Increase the damage of arrows that ricochet from Barrage from 40%% to [50 - 90]%%. Barrage's arrows have a [30 - 70]%% chance to split into 2 arrows whenever they ricochet.

name: Aspect of Abundant Energy
description: Crackling Energy has a [35 - 55]%% chance to deal 40%%[x] increased damage and chain to an additional enemy.

name: Seismic-shift Aspect
description: Earth Spike deals [50 - 70]%%[x] increased damage and launches spikes in a line.

name: Blood Seeker's Aspect
description: Blood Lance deals [10 - 30]%%[x] increased damage to its primary target per lanced enemy.

name: Halting
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +[28.3 - 31.8]%% Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds

name: Aspect of Hungry Blood
description: Each cast of Blood Lance will launch an additional Blood Lance at a Nearby enemy when it first hits an enemy that is already lanced, dealing [40 - 80]%% of normal damage.

name: Aspect of Ancestral Echoes
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging enemies with Leap, Upheaval, or Whirlwind have up to a [45 - 65]%% chance to summon an Ancient to perform the same Skill. Can only occur once every 5 seconds.

name: Stormclaw's Aspect
description: Critical Strikes with Shred deal [40 - 60]%% of the damage dealt as Lightning damage to the target and surrounding enemies.

name: Vengeful Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Damaging a Vulnerable enemy has up to a 25%% chance to create an Arrow Storm at the enemy's location , dealing [156 - 486] Physical damage over 3 seconds. Your Arrow Storms deal [45 - 65]%% increased damage.

name: Aspect of The Aftershock
description: Landslide's earth pillars each strike a second time and deal an additional [5.5 - 15.5]%% bonus damage per hit.

name: Stormcrow's Aspect
description: Ravens now deal Lightning damage which is increased by [60 - 100]%%. Ravens Active deals its full damage in half the time, and enemies inside it are Stunned.

name: Shadowslicer Aspect
description: Dash spawns a Shadow Clone that also casts Dash, dealing [150 - 350]%% of the Base damage.

name: Glacial Aspect
description: When you cast Blizzard it will periodically spawn exploding Ice Spikes that deal [75 - 120] damage. Your Ice Spikes Chill enemies for 15%%.

name: [PH] Thorn & Heal Aspect
description: When first damaging Elite, and for 5 seconds after, your Thorn deals [300.0 - 500.0] damage and allows you to heal 10%% of your total health per second.

name: Aspect of Imitated Imbuement
description: Your Shadow Clones also mimic the Imbuements applied to your Skills. Casting an Imbuement Skill grants your active Shadow Clone [5 - 25]%%[x] increased damage for 9 seconds.

name: Raw Might Aspect
description: After hitting 15 enemies with your Shapeshifting Skills, your next Werebear Skill will deal [40 - 60]%%[x] more damage and Stun enemies for 3 seconds.

name: Toxic Alchemist's Aspect
description: Lucky Hit: Shadow Imbued Skills have up to a 75%% chance to create a toxic explosion that applies [60 - 90] Poisoning damage over 5 seconds to the target and surrounding enemies. If they were already Poisoned, increase this damage by 100%%[x].

name: Infiltrator's Aspect
description: Poison Trap no longer breaks Stealth and triggers no Cooldown or arm time while you are in Stealth. All Poison Traps activate when you exit Stealth and Poison Trap's Cooldown will be [8.0 - 4.0] seconds per trap placed.

name: Brawler's Aspect
description: Enemies damaged by Kick or Charge will explode if they are killed within the next 2 seconds, dealing [375 - 488] damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Aspect of Piercing Static
description: Charged Bolts pierce, but deal [70 - 30]%%[x] less damage to targets hit after the first.

name: Cadaverous Aspect
description: Consuming a Corpse increases the damage of your Core Skills by [3.5 - 7]%%[x] for 5 seconds, up to [18 - 35]%%[x].

name: Aspect of Bursting Venoms
description: Lucky Hit: Poison Imbued Skills have up to a 15%% chance to create a toxic pool that deals [420 - 546] Poisoning damage over 3 seconds to enemies within. While standing in the pool, your Poison Imbuement Skill has no Cooldown and no Charge limit.

name: Aspect of Grasping Veins
description: Gain [5 - 25]%%[+] increased Critical Strike Chance for 6 seconds when you cast Corpse Tendrils. You deal [10 - 50]%%[x] bonus Critical Strike Damage to enemies for 6 seconds after they are damaged by Corpse Tendrils.

name: Aspect of Piercing Cold
description: Ice Shards pierce [3 - 19] times, dealing [25 - 5]%% less damage per subsequent enemy hit.

name: Aspect of Reanimation
description: Your Minions gain increased damage while alive, up to [25 - 45]%%[x] after 10 seconds.

name: Halting
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a +14.0%% Chance to Stun for 2 Seconds

name: Jolting Aspect
description: Every [3.0 - 1.0] seconds, you zap a nearby enemy for 225 Lightning damage.This effect is treated as a Shock Skill.

name: Aspect of the Dire Whirlwind
description: Whirlwind's Critical Strike Chance is increased by [3 - 12]%%[+] for each second it is channeled, up to [9 - 36]%%[+].

name: Trickster's Aspect
description: Caltrops and Smoke Grenade receive your Stun Grenade benefits and throw Stun Grenades that deal [78 - 168] Physical damage and Stun enemies for 1 second.Your Stun Grenades deal [25 - 45]%% increased damage.

name: Devilish Aspect
description: After generating 100 Fury your next direct damage creates 2 Dust Devils that deal [60 - 105] damage to enemies along their path.

name: Aspect of Burning Rage
description: While Berserking, you deal [68 - 124] Fire damage every second to surrounding enemies.

name: Aspect of Natural Balance
description: Casting a Storm Skill grants your Earth Skills [30.0 - 50.0]%%[x] Critical Strike Damage for 4 seconds.Casting a Earth Skill increases the Critical Strike Chance of Storm Skills by [8.0 - 13.3]%%[+] for 4 seconds.

name: Nighthowler's Aspect
description: Blood Howl increases Critical Strike Chance by [10.0 - 18.0]%%[+]. In addition, Blood Howl also affects Nearby Players for 3 seconds.

name: Subterranean Aspect
description: Poison Creeper's active also casts Landslide in a circle around you. Earth Skills deal [15 - 35]%% increased damage to Poisoned enemies.
